name: Bulk Comments Management
author: Yakup Hoca

sections.description: This plugin allows administrators to globally delete comments (spam, trash, unapproved comments), enable/disable comments on all posts.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin settings page can be accessed via the ‘Tools’ menu in the administration area.
sections.faq:
There is no Question.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin settings page can be accessed via the ‘Tools’ menu in the administration area.
